JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants , PERSON and PERSON , are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in PERSON , GPE . They are represented before the ORG by Mr T. Atanesyan , a lawyer practising in GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by their Agent , PERSON , Representative of GPE at ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . The applicants jointly owned a house which measured QUANTITY m and was situated at CARDINAL FAC , GPE . It appears that they also enjoyed a right of lease in respect of the underlying plot of land .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Government adopted Decree no . PERSON , approving the expropriation zones of the immovable property ( plots of land , buildings and constructions ) situated within the administrative boundaries of LOC of GPE to be taken for the needs of the State for the purpose of carrying out construction projects , covering a total area of QUANTITY m. FAC was listed as one of the streets falling within such expropriation zones .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Government decided to contract out the construction of CARDINAL of the sections of FAC DATE which was to be renamed FAC – to a private company , ORG

CARDINAL . On DATE PERSON and ORG signed an agreement which , inter alia , authorised the former to negotiate directly with the owners of the property subject to expropriation and , should such negotiations fail , to institute court proceedings on behalf of the ORG , seeking forced expropriation of such property .

CARDINAL . It appears that ORG unsuccessfully attempted to organise a valuation of the applicants ' house in order to offer them compensation for the purpose of expropriation , since the applicants created obstacles .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG instituted proceedings against the applicants on behalf of the ORG . Referring to , inter alia , Government Decree no . PERSON , the plaintiff sought to oblige them to allow a valuation of their house , to terminate their ownership of the house through payment of compensation based on the results of such valuation , and to have them evicted .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date the applicants lodged a counter - claim with the ORG and ORG of GPE ( Երևան քաղաքի Կենտրոն և Նորք-Մարաշ համայնքների աոաջին ատյանի դատարան ) in which they contested the constitutionality of Government Decree no . CARDINAL It appears that this counter - claim was not admitted on the ground that ORG was not competent to decide upon the constitutionality of Government decrees . The applicants further requested the court to put into motion the procedure for testing the constitutionality of the above Decree , which was similarly rejected .
CARDINAL . It appears that at some point the value of the applicants ' house was estimated at CARDINAL by a valuation company .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG granted the claim of ORG , terminating the applicants ' ownership in respect of the house , awarding them the NORP dram ( ORG ) equivalent of CARDINAL and ordering their eviction . The court based its findings on ORG and CARDINAL of LAW , while the amount of compensation was determined on the basis of the above valuation report .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ քաղաքացիական գործերով վերաքննիչ դատարան ) granted the claim of ORG on the same grounds as FAC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal on points of law . In their appeal they argued , inter alia , that the deprivation of their property was unlawful and contravened LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ վճռաբեկ դատարան ) dismissed the applicants ' appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the relevant enforcement proceedings were instituted .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants signed an agreement with ORG on termination of their ownership in respect of the immovable property situated on a plot of land to be taken for ORG needs and payment of compensation . According to this agreement , which was concluded for the purpose of implementation of construction projects envisaged by Government Decrees nos . PERSON and ORG , the applicants agreed to give up their ownership of the house and their lease of the underlying plot of land in favour of ORG for a compensation in the net total amount of AMD CARDINAL,CARDINAL,CARDINAL and to vacate the LOC by DATE .
CARDINAL . For a summary of the relevant domestic provisions see the judgment in the case of PERSON and PERSON v. GPE ( no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE ) .
CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL provides that the parties are entitled to reach a friendly settlement in the course of enforcement proceedings .

CARDINAL . According to LAW § CARDINAL ( CARDINAL ) , the bailiff shall terminate the enforcement proceedings if the creditor and the debtor have reached a friendly settlement which has been approved by a court .
